```{r Load Libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(tabulizer)
library(openxlsx)
```

```{r}
link <- "http://cgfa.ilga.gov/Upload/03052019econforecastrevest2019-2020.pdf"
table <- extract_tables(link,
               pages = 36,
               method = "stream")
exp <- as.data.frame(table[[1]])
write.xlsx(exp,"COGA_GenFundRevHist_Mar.xlsx")
```
